articles.title: Over 150 espionage flights in April
articles.content:
Over 150 espionage flights in April 
    Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists committed more than 150 cases of aerial espionage against the DPRK in April by mobilizing strategic and tactical reconnaissance planes with various missions, according to a military source.
 Among them were over 30 cases of aerial espionage by U-2 high-altitude strategic reconnaissance planes.   
 Involved in the aerial photographing, electronic reconnaissance and other aerial espionage against the DPRK were E-3 early-warning plane, RC-135 strategic reconnaissance plane, P-3 patrol plane, RC-12, RF-4c tactical reconnaissance planes and EH-60 electronic warfare helicopters.

articles.title: S. Korean trade unions launch all-out struggle
Legal action against national police office chief urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Legal action against national police office chief urged in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The South Korean Bar Association held that the chief of the national police office should be punished for the violence committed towards unionists of the Daewoo Motor Company, Seoul-based Radio No. 1 reported.
 The organization in a report on the truth behind the police violence on the unionists on April 26 said that an analysis of the video-recorded scene disclosed the deputy chief of the Inchon district police office on April 10 was present there to command the quelling of the strike.    
 It noted that policemen under the district police offices of Seoul, Kyonggi Province and South Korean Kangwon Province were sent to the spot to crack down upon the strike, demanding legal actions against the chief of the national police office who commanded police force and all the policemen who incited violence on the spot.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's work published in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's work published in Italy 
    Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- "Socialism is a Science", a famous work of leader Kim Jong Il, was brought out in booklet by the struggle for the peace and socialism of Italy on the occasion of Sun's Day.
 The work was published on November 1, Juche 83 (1994).    
 It fully proves the scientific nature of socialism as an inevitable outcome of social development and comprehensively clarifies the essential advantages of the socialist society and its invincibility.
